title: Fibromyalgia Treatment Guidelines
content: Fibromyalgia is characterized by widespread musculoskeletal pain accompanied by fatigue, sleep, memory, and mood issues. Management is multimodal, including education, graduated exercise programs, cognitive behavioral therapy, and medications such as pregabalin, duloxetine, or milnacipran. Sleep hygiene improvement and stress reduction techniques are integral components of treatment. Patient self-management strategies are emphasized.
